question: What is the theme for Second Cohort under the RBI’s Regulatory Sandbox (RS)?
explanation:
The Reserve Bank of India has recently announced opening of Second Cohort under the Regulatory Sandbox (RS) with ‘Cross Border Payments,’ as its theme. 
The Test Phase under the First Cohort on “Retail Payment” has already commenced. RBI has also stated that “MSME Lending” would be the theme for the Third Cohort. A regulatory sandbox (RS) refers to live testing of products or services in a test regulatory environment.
